welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Somers Point, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant community. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlantic City International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Atlantic City International Airport is primarily used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Millville Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Millville Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cape May County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Cape May County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
